name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software System Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance embedded systems and applications, specializing in technical specifications, system architecture, and integration strategies. Proficient in Linux-based environments and skilled in hardware integration with communication interfaces such as **SPI**, **I²C**, **UART**, **CAN**, and **Ethernet**. Hands-on expertise in requirements analysis and feasibility studies, ensuring alignment with technical assessments and trade-off analyses.

Adept in collaborating with software teams and utilizing analytical and problem-solving skills to drive project success. Well-versed in documentation practices and standards compliance, enhancing communication interfaces and integration outcomes. Familiar with **ECSS**, **INCOSE**, **SYSML2**, and **PlantUML** methodologies. Experienced in leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and framework knowledge in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to deliver quality solutions. Proven track record in building AI/ML applications with a strong background in MLOps and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**.
